name: Cool Beats
description:
Android rhythm game (theres only 1 song)

Kinda like Guitar Hero, or DanceDanceRevolution, or FridayNightFunkin (yeah I stole FNF's logo lol)

I'd add more content, but copying levels is a pain, 'cause of weird editor (Pocketcode) I'm using. Thank goodness for backups.

Comment down below if you like commenting down below :)
